Html:
Hi tanks friends

I'm surprised that Valor Medal of the First War is better than The Black Heart in burstime scale, 147,05 against 102,85 do yhou have the same ? (I've refresh cache data from wowhead)

That means 84 dodge is better than 126 stamina do you agree ?

 

I'm protwarior

I'd never choose 84 dodge over 126 stamina, especially due to the proc on the stamina trinket. Once you edit the values of the stm trinket and correct the values (doesn't seem to import correctly), the Black Heart is wayyyy at the top (top 2 or 3) once you consider the avg proc.
